definition: the property possessed by a large mass, to cause to bulge or swell outwards
details:
noun
- the property possessed by a large mass
- the property of something that is great in magnitude
= example: the property of something that is great in magnitude
= synonyms: mass
- the property resulting from being or relating to the greater in number of two parts
= synonyms: majority
verb
- to cause to bulge or swell outwards
= example: to cause to bulge or swell outwards
= synonyms: bulge
- to stick out or up
= example: to stick out or up
